reviewText: I am a huge fan of Harlock, Emeraldas and the Galaxy express.  Even if you've never heard of Leiji Matsumoto, give Zero a chance.  I adore the artistic style plus the story.  It's great science-fiction and goes along with the Emeraldas setting.  Check it out!!

This is a good series and this volume introduces many characters in Leiji Matsumoto's universe.  That is one of the things I like about this series, it connects different series such as Gun Frontier, Galaxy 999, and Captain Herlock.  The story is quite interesting and keeps you guessing. If you are a Leiji Matsumoto fan buy this series.
